mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 4-3, east wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Donohue, Liam Patrick [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Various diary entries of weather, from as early as 2008, some with "high" and "low" temp forecasts; only the most interesting ones transcribed here. Curse against final exams ("sma" probably stands for 'suck my ass'). The phrase "My leg!!" is often heard in the background of particularly destructive scenes of the cartoon Spongebob Squarepants. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

Time: 8:27 pm | February 17, 2019 | High: Katherine °F | where's summer? | Time. 9:25 | Monday April 30, 2018 | Finals can sma | April 29, 2009 | why is it still cold? | 10:56 | Nov 13, 2013 | 30° and dark | Time: 10:14 pm | April 19, 2011 | 2 weeks from today and this will be over! :) | My leg!!
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Diaries
Education, Higher
Weather
SpongeBob SquarePants (Fictitious character)
